content: ch4 of round slip_stitch in 3rd chain 19 edging round 3 a ch1 work 1 single_crochet in each treble_crochet and 1 single_crochet in each space along edges b in the corners that have 5 trs single_crochet in next treble_crochet 2sc in next space 4 times single_crochet in next treble_crochet c in the corner that have 3 trs single_crochet in next treble_crochet 2sc in next space 3 times single_crochet in next treble_crochet d at end of round slip_stitch into next st fasten_off yarn weave in yarn tails finishing block shawl according to the fiber used 10 for more information please keep in touch ● i will be publishing free patterns in my ravelry pattern shop lisa hounshell designs as they become available ● subscribe to my youtube channel https //youtube com/@breakawaycrochet to be notified of new video tutorials ● general information and motif library can be found on the breakawaycrochet com website ● if you have questions or would like to share your finished item join the breakaway crochet method | support and chat on facebook copyright 2023 lisa hounshell 11
